phrases: Not quite what I had in mind...
It actually turned out to be delicious!
I want to give it to him no matter what!
I have got to give it to him!
If I am not mistaken, today's Valentine's Day, huh?
Well, not that it means much to me.
Not that it really means anything to me...
You were hopeful, were you not?
As if there would be any chocolates in my locker...
There is no way in hell.
Well, let us just pray that somebody will give us some by the end of the day... comrade!
It is not a big deal, all right?
Awww, I wish someone would give me some chocolate!
After all, I have never gotten any from a girl before...
Will Chitoge bring me some, maybe?
I mean, we are boyfriend and girlfriend on paper...
Nah, that is never going to happen, right?
As if she would give me any!
Oh, by the way, is there something special about today?
For some reason, everyone seems kind of giddy.
You have never heard of Valentine's Day?
Oh, right, in the YOU.S., you do not give guys chocolate, right?
I see, so that is why, huh?
I hope you are not actually expecting any from me, are you?
Fake couple or not, I am pretty sure I am not obligated to go that far!
Just as I thought, no joy, huh?
Well, who would expect her to do something so maidenly anyway?
What kind of an attitude was that?
I have only made it harder to give them to him!
It is such a nice day today, huh, Ichijo?
Oh, no, what am I going to do?
I am out of reasons to talk to him!
Seriously, at this rate, will I be able to give it to him?
Hmm, Onodera's behaving exactly the way she always does.
If you do not mind, please accept these!
Of course she gave you Valentine's chocolates.
Valentine's Day, see, is the day that you give chocolates to people you hate!
But I do not remember doing anything to make those girls hate me.
So listen, if you go buy some chocolates for, say, Raku...
and give them to him, something good might happen to you!
If that is the case, first of all, I am giving these chocolates to you.
Now what was that all about?
I am going to tell you the truth this time.
Who would have guessed that Tsugumi liked Shu?
I have no clue what goes on in a woman's mind...
For not quite finishing this on time!
You are not getting away, Master Raku!
She really is amazing, that Marika.
Being able to voice her feelings so aggressively...
Why am I being such a wimp?
Did not I somehow manage to make delicious chocolate, too?
I have got to give it my all!
Um... I... have something for you...
Do not worry, I am fine!
I managed to make this, and now look...
I cannot give it to him now, not like this...
It is too bad, since they are actually delicious...
I mean really... delicious, you know?
Hmm... she is nowhere to be found.
Just now, Onodera did not seem like her usual self to me.
You come back here, damn you!
Just how far will he go to ridicule me?
Why are you making that weird noise?
No, cannot say that I did.
Actually, I have something important to tell you...
Boy, did you shock me good!
I had no idea that you were into Shu...
Are you sure you are not?
Then those chocolates you had... where did they come from?
A girl from another class said they were for me...
Come to think of it, why would she give me chocolate?
Do not tell me she is another one who does not get what Valentine's Day is about...
Or else did she think I was a boy, maybe?
Aw, no, I am sure that is not it.
Even a girl like Tsugumi's getting chocolate!
And here I am with zero... this is beyond frustrating!
Do you really desire chocolate all that much?
The cries from my soul were audible...
I hear there is something called an obligatory chocolate system...
If that is good enough for you...
I do not mind giving you this.
Even if it is obligatory, I am totally happy!
Does it make you that happy?
Oh, man, I am so thrilled!
After all, this is the first time in my whole life that a girl has given me chocolate!
I will be sure to return the favor on White Day, okay?
Maybe I should just mind my own business,
but if somebody gives you any chocolate, do not give it away like you did just now.
Since I am sure that person mustered up all her courage to give it to you.
You should mind your own business!
I am perfectly aware of that.
If that is the case, then make sure you savor mine, too...
I reeled off that speech to Tsugumi,
but I am still on the run from Tachibana without accepting her chocolate!
And yet I went and lectured somebody else...
At the time, it was just instinct that made me turn tail and run,
but all Tachibana did was bring me the chocolate she would made!
I am going to look for Tachibana first and apologize.
I will take care of Onodera afterwards...
If only I had not run off like that...
I am terribly sorry, Master Raku.
I had crafted this for you, but due to my carelessness, it is now in pieces.
I will make you another one and bring it in at a later date, so will you please accept it then?
I feel like my heart's about to shatter...
What the hell did I do?
Look at this epic hunk of chocolate that Tachibana made for me...
Oh, no, you must not, Master Raku!
Putting something so soiled into your mouth...
Just let me eat it, Tachibana!
Otherwise, I can never rest easy!
I really am sorry about this.
Of course I am happy that you feel that way,
but if you go on, it will surely upset your stomach!
Your health is more important to me...
Just let me eat this, okay?
What do you say to this?
To make up for today's chocolate incident,
will you grant me any wish of my choosing - just one?
If you agree, I will just let this go, all right?
And Master Raku, please feel free to forget about this chocolate!
If that is how you feel about it...
I will make this up to you.
But I am still going to eat this chocolate.
No... that is so unfair, Master Raku!
What difference does it make, anyway?
But this chocolate tastes so amazing!
I am only eating it because I want to, so do not stop me.
Oh, man, I thought my number was up!
Who knew she would blow her top like that?
You do know it is your fault for telling her stupid lies, do not you?
You are the one to blame.
Well, now, I do not have a retort for that!
By the way, Ruri, are not you giving anybody chocolate?
Unfortunately, I have no such plans.
Well, then, those Pockys will do just fine, so let me have them, will you?
After all, it is Valentine's Day!
Just because you could not get your hands on a single chocolate, do not start pestering me.
Uh, actually, I did get two this year!
I wonder why it is that you annoy me so much?
Come to think of it, I wonder how Kosaki's been faring?
What are you doing in a place like this?
Are you planning to give them to someone?
Do not tell me it is someone you have got a crush on!
And so I went all-out and made them, but...
Before I could give them to him, I ruined them myself.
So you are not giving that person chocolate anymore?
At the very least, I know I am not giving him these...
Then can I have these chocolates?
I mean, I am a pretty good cook myself,
but I do not think I could make chocolate this good!
Are not you giving anyone chocolate yourself, Chitoge?
I do have someone I want to give chocolate to.
But I just cannot bring myself to do it...
Is it someone you have a crush on, Chitoge?
By any chance, would that be...
I think I just asked her something I should not have!
It is so not that idiot bean sprout!
We are only faking being boyfriend and girlfriend, so...!
I would not even give him obligatory chocolate!
What am I going to do?
A huge lie just popped out of my mouth!
But I cannot say I like him now... it would be too embarrassing!
I see, for a couple only pretending to be dating, they just seemed so into each other...
So that was just me overthinking it all...
Is not there someone you like?
I was really planning to give these chocolates to him...
But I have given up on that now.
Uh, listen, that is not what I meant!
I would already decided not to give them to him!
But it made me happy to hear you say they were delicious.
But you know, that was such a surprise.
To hear that you had a crush on someone.
Oh, but now that I think of it, it must be such a hassle!
Since you are pretending to be dating Ichijo...
You are the first person, you know.
That I have ever told about liking someone.
This kind of thing really makes your heart pound, huh?
The only people who know about my crush are probably you and Ruri.
Because I have always kept it a secret.
Hey, then what do you say to this?
We are going to go on keeping this a secret from other people!
And we are going to root for each other in our respective romances!
And until we both find true love, neither of us can probe each other about who it is that we like...
Okay, then, that is a promise!
Let us both give it our all!
Okay, let us get right to it, then...
Why do not we make your chocolates over again, Kosaki?
It would be such a waste to give up!
Just re-make those chocolates, and give them to that person!
And I will do my best to hand my chocolates over, too!
Chitoge, you would better go now, or the person you like will be heading home!
But the chocolates are not done yet!
Or you will not get to give them to him today!
Thank you for helping me out, Chitoge.
I am going to hang in here till the last second, and I am sure they will end up delicious!
So I want you to give it your best shot, too.
There is something I want to talk to you about.
This time, you have got to be honest...
I hear today's Valentine's Day, huh?
We did talk about that this morning?
last night, I coincidentally just happened to make some homemade chocolate, see...
What kind of a coincidence is that?
And since I just happened to bring some with me,
they are just obligatory, but I guess I do not mind giving them to you for Valentine's Day.
You really do not know how to be honest...
But... going out of your way to bring me your homemade chocolate...
I guess you do have your good points now and then...
If you are going to be so rude, give them back!
I would say this was a pretty great effort for you.
This tastes like actual chocolate, you know!
I will be expecting you to pay me back tenfold, okay?
Well, I somehow managed to give him the chocolate!
Seriously, to think it takes this much courage to give chocolate to someone you like?
I used salt instead of sugar!
I have always been the type who only succeeds once every ten thousand times...
But no way am I giving up!
Because I made that promise with Chitoge!
I wonder if she left a while ago?
So you were still here at school...
Do not tell me you are giving me chocolate?
I really wanted to give this to you sooner.
It turned out pretty delicious, so try it, please.
If Onodera made it, I would eat it no matter how horrible it tasted...
I have never eaten chocolate this good!
I have never made anything this good before in my life...
It might be a one-in-a-million thing!
Wait a second... were you making this chocolate all this time, then?
C-Could it be that this chocolate is... for your true love?
But it is a slightly special kind of obligatory.
Since I did not get much sleep last night, my eyes are all red.
I wish I could have looked a little cuter when I gave it to him.
